Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGOBE; ENGRAVED; RELIEF
Name: Lamp
Description: Bitruncate cone-shaped lamp, circular in outline, with a disc which is marked with a moulding and a ribbon handle which starts at the orifice for fuel and ends at the curvature in the middle. Reddish-coloured paste. Surface with coating of a reddish colour, partially lost. On the disc and all around it, we find an incised decoration consisting of garlands and circles which are arranged radially. Signs of use in the orifice for light.
